I have heretrix set up on a dual core Linux box with 2.8Ghz cpu's and
8G me=
mory. And the box does not have anything else running on it but
heretrix. H=
eretrix is downloading pages at at very slow rate. On an
avg 1.03 Urls/sec.=
 I have max_toe_threads set to 100. And I normally
see 1 or 2 threads activ=
e at any given point. I would like to know why
heretrix is running so slow,=
 and what can I do to speed it up.
